_doc: Reusable combined panel: colored mode background blocks with a line series overlaid on top.
_usage: Copy this panel into any dashboard. Two queries needed: Query A (refId A) outputs mode background series using union() — each mode is a separate _field with value 100 when active, 0 otherwise, stacked to form colored blocks. Query B (refId B) outputs the overlay line series (_field as label, _value as numeric). IMPORTANT: Query B map() must create clean records ({_time, _value, _field}) — do NOT use ({r with ...}) or metadata columns leak into the series name. Update 'overrides' to match your state names and colors. The overlay series name must match the override matcher (default: 'Battery %').

overrides._comment: Overlay line series — change 'Battery %' to match your line series _field name
One override per state — change names and colors to match your data. hideFrom.tooltip keeps these out of the tooltip.

targets._comment: Query A: Mode backgrounds — one series per state, value 100 when active, 0 otherwise. Replace bucket, measurement, field, and mode tag names to match your data.
targets.query:
data = from(bucket: "vessel-data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "battery_telemetry")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "charge_percentage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.mission == "${mission}")
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 2m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

union(tables: [
  data |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: if r.mode == "Direct" then 100.0 else 0.0, _field: "Direct"})) |> group(columns: ["_field"]),
  data |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: if r.mode == "Idle" then 100.0 else 0.0, _field: "Idle"})) |> group(columns: ["_field"]),
  data |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: if r.mode == "Navigation" then 100.0 else 0.0, _field: "Navigation"})) |> group(columns: ["_field"]),
  data |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: if r.mode == "Station" then 100.0 else 0.0, _field: "Station"})) |> group(columns: ["_field"]),
  data |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: if r.mode == "Voyage" then 100.0 else 0.0, _field: "Voyage"})) |> group(columns: ["_field"])
])

targets._comment: Query B: Overlay line — replace with your numeric time series. IMPORTANT: use clean records in map() like ({_time: r._time, _value: ..., _field: ...}) to avoid metadata leaking into series name.
targets.query:
from(bucket: "vessel-data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "battery_telemetry")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "charge_percentage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.mission == "${mission}")
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: r._value * 100.0, _field: "Battery %"}))
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])

title: Mode Transitions with Overlay
